channel.title: Custom NPC disconnects me when I attack
channel.description:
Please help me,
When I attack a custom npc, it disconnects me. I added the attack animation, max hit, added to npc.cfg, and everything. I get this error: java.lang.NullPointerException at client.followDirection(client.java:2259) at client.process(client.java:14932) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:270) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

item.title: Custom NPC disconnects me when I attack
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Possible ways to debug through this.

1.Fix its attack emote to be the same one as its stand emote
2.Find out if the npc is in wilderness if its in wilderness and it checks for attackingOn2. is checked for an npc, then ofcourse it will disconnect you.
3.Check to see if the npc has some special code that happends such as scripting, type in the npcid then search for it make sure it doesnt crash before you put the npc in to your client.

Pretty simple ways to look nothing else i can really offer.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom NPC disconnects me when I attack

No errors before, it even did it before adding the animations and max hit.
